Quick facts about Anadea: 
​In business since 2000
300+ projects delivered​​ 
Dev offices in Ukraine, Bealrus and Spain
In-house team of 100+ IT experts

Business Analysis. UX/UI Design. Custom Software Development. Web Development (Backend and Frontend). Mobile App Development (iOS and Android). Software Testing and QA.

Education. LMS, eLearning platforms and educational apps.
Healthcare. EMR/EHR, practice management systems and medical apps.
Real Estate. Marketplaces, property management and collaboration tools.
Ecommerce. Ecommerce portals and loyalty apps.
Travel. Travel portals, booking engines and apps.
Sports. Team management and coaching solutions.
Advantages we offer:
Ability to properly translate your requirements into tech solutions 
Dedication to exceeding your expectations and creating a valuable product
Well-organized development process
Ultimate honesty, transparency and flexibility
Clear and straight communication
Collaborative approach to project management 
Reputation evidenced by reviews and references
